name: Project. Chrono
description:
Chrono is a vertical slice  of a first person platformer puzzler game in which you use a gun to manipulate space and time of the objects around you to progress through a level.

Want to know more about this project? Click here.

Mechanics/Controls
Freeze (any moving object)   | Left click
Pick up/drop | Right  click
Throw | Right click (Hold and release)
Movement | WASD
Jump  | Space
Sprint  | L.  SHIFT
